job title: Truck Controller -  ( better salary & good environment ) )
position: Truck Controller -  ( better salary & good environment ) )
Job Description:
•	Assist in controlling and monitoring all trucks of Chip Mong Group 
•	Make sure that all logistics activities are arranged properly
•	Make sure that the goods are delivered with the right quantities, to the right location and be on time
•	Involve in trainings the traffic law and truck maintenance to all drivers
•	Assist in controlling all transporting goods from warehouses to customers
•	Assist in controlling the movement of trucks to make sure that all drivers obey traffic law and the Company’s policies
•	Find trucks from suppliers in order to deliver the goods on time if needed
•	Assist in controlling, monitoring and evaluation all drivers performance  
•	Assist in controlling GPS System on all trucks
•	Cooperate with other divisions/departments of the Company
•	Perform other duties as assigned from Senior Officer.
Job Requirement:
• Male only
• Bachelor degree holder in Business Administration or related field
• Good communication in English both spoken and written
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, such Ms. Word, Excel, Internet and Email, etc.
• At least 1 year experience with this position or related position
• Willing to work under pressure, and flexible environment
• To be honest, hard-working, patient, reliable, ect.

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including year-end double pay, meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.


Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with covering letter and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, to hr@chipmonggroup.com or our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia, is available at www.chipmonggroup.com or Tel: 017 593 222
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017 593 222 P.O Box 137, #137B, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia.  017 593 222

Company Profile:
Share Tea Dining Business Corporate was founded in 1992 by Mr. Cheng Kai-Lung and we started off our business with to-go black tea and pearl milk tea drinks. With great comments and feedback from our customers Share Tea was known as good tea. Since then, we have expanded our branches all over the world and we have had great success as part of the tea-drinking sector.

In 1992, the very first shop of Share Tea opened in Taipei City; three years later, Share Tea Corporation was founded; in 1999, the franchise brand “CUP-BON” was established in Malaysia successfully; in 2004, the patent T-shaped bag was invented and became a new trend; in 2010, Share Tea first chain store was opened in Hong Kong which is famous for its marvelous cuisines and within a short period of time, 40 chain stores were opened all over Hong Kong and Macao; in 2011, we targeted Chinese markets including Beijing , Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen; also expanded our markets worldwide from Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines, Brunei and Australia to New York and even Dubai. The image of “a Sharetea drink in your hand” has imprinted in our customers’ minds which leads Sharetea Pearl Milk Tea to its success internationally.

The chairman of Lian-Fa International Sharetea, Cheng Kai-lung, has always seen himself as a leader in tea-drinking sector. Share Tea is the only beverage industry franchise corporation which is recognized as “Taiwan Good Chain Store” by Ministry of Economic Affairs, Taiwan for 6 consecutive years. We were the only pearl milk tea at the 2009 Taipei Deaflmpics and the only pearl milk tea brand that represented Taiwanese culture in R.O.C. 100th birthday celebration.

What we see ourselves in the future is to expand our market like a ripple with a new way of thinking which means health + tea drinks = healthy trend, and a new way of marketing which means creation + tea drinks=creative new fashion. Our mission is to introduce the world the most authentic Taiwanese tea-drinking

Job Description:
RESPONSIBILITIES
•	Marketing and Public Relation Executive 
-	Design and develop marketing materials, e.g. corporate brochure, articling brochure, personal and practice group profiles, website.
-	Develop and integrate marketing activities across service areas, e.g. logo, templates for request for proposals, PowerPoint, etc...
-	Monitor production of marketing materials to ensure consistency and appropriateness.
-	Liaising and building relationships with a range of stakeholders, e.g. customers, suppliers and colleagues.
-	Develop and implement the firm’s public relations program, to include internal and external publications (e.g. newsletters, client alert, greeting cards, etc.) that enhance awareness of the firm
-	Develop and implement the firm’s advertising program- design and place advertisements, negotiate contracts with media, work with design agencies on advertising campaigns.
-	Evaluate marketing campaigns.
-	Elaborate the marketing strategy of the company based on sales analysis, market trends and technical constraints in accordance with company’s missions.
-	Research and development (analysis, economic, market trend)
-	Build up marketing plan in accordance to the strategy by setting up objectives and sales targets.
-	Analyze the market expectation for online products and services
-	Quality control of online products and services (in the whole value chain)
-	Organize events to develop the public awareness of online products and services.
-	Monitor closely the key indicators: Business generated, product released to the market, etc…
-	Monitoring competitor’s activity.
Job Requirement:
REQUIREMENTS
•	Marketing and Public Relation Executive 
-	At least Bachelor degree in Marketing and related field
-	Minimum 2 years working experience in Marketing, Sale, or Public relation 
-	Good command of English and other foreign language, an advantage
-	Good interpersonal skill and problem solving skill
-	Dedication, creativity, and flexibility 
-	Work under pressure and self motivation
-	Good attitude, personality and honesty
-	Computer Microsoft office

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Job Description:
1.	Liaison with Head Office personnel in monitoring documentation and schedule of arrival of vehicles into the country.
2.	Preparation of relevant documentation for import customs clearance of vehicles.
3.	Coordination with customs broker on submission to relevant Authorities and Ministries for approvals/permits.
4.	Liaison and follow up with relevant Authorities and Ministries when necessary.
5.	Ensure maintenance and proper filing of all related importation, customs documents.
6.	Coordination with logistics provider or transportation to ensure safe delivery of vehicles to car yard.
7.	Ensure proper maintenance of car yard and vehicles parked in car yard.
8.	Coordination of delivery of vehicles to showroom.
Job Requirement:
•	Possess a diploma or degree in Business Administration or equivalent. 
•	At least 3 years related working experience, familiarity with customs clearance, logistics and forwarding industry is an added advantage.
•	Familiarity with Customs and Tax Departments.
•	Understanding or familiarity with Custom checkpoint procedures.
•	Able to communicate well in spoken and written English and local language (Khmer  or Laotian).
•	Computer literate with proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel applications.
•	Possess own transport and willing to travel.
•	Self-motivated and able to work as a team player.

Company Profile:
Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) is a non-profit organization, established at the end of 1995 in Cambodia, working to provide food, shelter, medical care, general education and vocational training to children needing support, e.g. underprivileged children; maltreated children; children living in poverty and children without any formal education in Phnom Penh, Sihanoukville and Siem Reap. 

Currently PSE is providing help to more than 6,500 children, supporting around 3,000 children in public schools, 1,500 in the remedial education program, and 1,500 in the vocational training program. Around 500 children benefit from specific educational programs: classes for children with disability, day-care centers, infant welfare etc.

PSE employs more than 500 dedicated staff. Due to rapid growth of existing and new programs, PSE is seeking candidates for the position of Gardener (01 post), based in Phnom Penh.

Job Description:
We are an international publisher, specialising in travel and tourist publications, such us guide books, maps, and travel magazines. We are currently recruiting for an Advertising Sales Manager to lead the commercial aspects of an exciting re-launched publication.

As Advertising Sales Manager, your primary role will be to secure advertisement and sponsorship deals for our client’s portfolio of print, electronic media and respective supplements. You must be able to shoulder responsibility and to take the initiative in finding and developing leads and seeing them through to sales. The role requires the ability both to close short term targets and to cultivate fruitful long-term business relationships.

Other responsibilities will include:

Company Profile:
Formally known as American Academy of Language and Art (AALA), ELT was founded by US entrepreneurs who strongly believed that education was a foundation in rebuilding the lives of Cambodian civilians. EESS is part of the ELT institution which offers many classes ranging from grades one to twelve. Students are given the opportunity to undertake studies in both Khmer and English which has been inspired by the learning and teaching standards of America. The Cambodian Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport recognizes the school’s commitment to education and has granted the rights for EESS to issue diplomas after meeting the credit requirements.

Due to students’ willingness and persistency in rebuilding their lives through education, the management team of ELT institution was able to introduce Cambodian International University in 2010. CamIU was established with the hope of providing students with Advanced Diploma, Intensive Diploma, Associate Degree, Bachelor’s Degree and Master Degrees that are widely recognized by the Cambodian Government. 

Over the years, ELT institution has made tremendous progress. In the beginning of 2010, there were 375 registered staff members and 5850 enrolled students. The prestigious reputation of ELT Group continues to grow and will do so through the strong leadership of its management team.

Job Description:
Vacancy Type:Marketing/Accounting/Finance
Work Experience:5

The main role for Client Services is to create and maintain relationship between the agency and it’s clients. The Client Services will generally ensure the alignment of promotional strategies with overall business goals for each client through liaison, direct contact of agency resources. He/She will be the key, day-to-day agency representative of the client and will maintain a highly responsive service orientation in all transactions.

The Client Services will work along the Directors for creating an overall Marketing/Strategy plan for each client, creating presentations as well as writing proposals and engagement strategies. 

Manage all of our work and check with work quality for client and company
Job Requirement:
- Manage of work that relate our service and client.
- Must have completed a business degree or relative
- At least 5 years professional experience in client servicing ideally in a reputed agency.
- Must possess good knowledge of the market/sale/strategy plan  and  and already have good contacts with decision makers at various organizations.
- Experience in writing briefs & creating marketing/strategy plans and budgets.
-Strong technical aptitude with the ability to express the capabilities and services.
- Ability to manage multiple clients simultaneously with an emphasis on solution derived customer service
- Ability to provide tracking and reporting across clients and their individual projects.
- Must be an expert in Business Communication skills with excellent authority on presentation applications (PowerPoint etc.)
- Excellent bilingual skills are a plus

job title: Khmer teacher of Chinese (competitive wages urgent)
position: Khmer teacher of Chinese (competitive wages urgent)
Job Description:
Vacancy Type:Work Experience:3 yearsAge:22 45- To be a teacher out of choice, and not by default.
- To write Lesson Plan and implement it accurately.
- To acquire relevant professional education and training to get the right concepts of teaching.
- Honesty and sincerity towards the profession.
- Accept that being a teacher does not make you a 'know it all'; so it's important to become a partner in the learning cycle with your students.
- Accept that no two students will think, act and react alike, and to respect that diversity.
- Upgrade knowledge and learn new ways of teaching.
- Avoid indulging in unethical behavior, and at all times maintain the dignity a teacher-student relation.


Towards Students

- Inculcate model behavior and mannerisms by self example.
- Prepare long-term teaching programs and daily lessons in accordance with the guidelines of the school's education system.
- Provide activities and materials that engage and challenge the students intellectually.
- Understand and implement the use of information technology in lesson preparation and teaching.
- Shift between a formal and an informal method of teaching; debates, discussions, practical activities, experiments, projects and excursions.
- Plan, set and evaluate grade test, exams and assignments.
- Supervise student conduct during class, lunchtime and other breaks.
- Understand the diverse background students come from, their strength, weakness and areas of interest.
- Be honest in student appraisal, avoid favoritism.
- Enforce discipline by firmly setting class room rules.
- Resolve conflict among students by encouraging positive debate.
- Be ready to adjust teaching styles to meet individual needs of students.

job title: វគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ
position: វគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ
Job Description:
សួស្តីអ្នកដែលមានចក្ខុវិស័យ ក្នុងការរកលុយតាម អនឡាញទាំងអស់គ្នា! ខ្ញុំដឹងថាមានប្រជាជនខ្មែរយើង ជាច្រើនដែលចង់សំរាក នៅផ្ទះ តែចង់បាន លុយហូរចូលច្រើនជា រៀងរាល់ខែ។ ខ្ញុំមិននិយាយថា ខ្ញុំជាមនុស្សពូកែ រឺ យ៉ាងណានោះទេ ក៏ប៉ុន្តែយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ ខ្ញុំបានរកឃើញ​នូវ គន្លឹសសំខាន់ៗ ជាច្រើនដែលអាចធ្វើអោយខ្ញុំ មានប្រាក់ចំនូល សមល្មមជារៀងរាល់ខែ ដោយគ្រាន់តែអង្គុយ នៅទីណា មួយក៏បាន អោយតែមាន Laptop និង​ Internet នោះជាការស្រេច។

ខ្ញុំតែងតែមានចក្ខុវិស័យ ចង់បាន មុខជំនួញមួយដែល ខុសពីអ្នកដ៏ទៃ បានន័យថា ភាគច្រើនមនុស្សគ្រប់គ្នា កំពុងតែធ្វើការអោយថៅកែ យ៉ាងសកម្ម តែចំពោះខ្ញុំវិញ កំពុងអង្គុយផឹកកាហ្វេ នៅក្នុង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ស្តាប់ចំរៀងពិរោះៗ តែលុយនៅហូរចូល ច្រើនៗ។ នេះជាលក្ខណៈពិសេស នៃការរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ។

ដោយសារតែខ្ញុំដឹងថា បងប្អូនទាំងអស់មានបំនង ចង់សិក្សាវិធីដែលរកលុយ តាមអនឡាញ ដូចខ្ញុំច្រើននាក់ពេក ទើបខ្ញុំសំរេចចិត្តបង្កើតវគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី​ អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ។

ហេតុអ្វីត្រូវចាំបាច់រៀន គ្រាន់តែស្រាវជ្រាវ អនឡាញក៏បានដែរ!!!

និយាយតាមត្រង់ទៅបើ បងប្អូន មិនដែលចេះអ្វីសោះពីមុនមក ខ្ញុំហ៊ានធានាថា បងប្អូននឹងចំណាយលុយ និងពេលឥតប្រយោជន៏រាប់ឆ្នាំ មិនខាន។ ទំរាំតែបងប្អូន រកគន្លឹសឃើញ អ្នកដ៏ទៃទៀតគេរកបានលុយ រាប់ពាន់បាត់ទៅហើយ បើចាំដល់ពេលនោះ តើបងប្អូននឹងមាន ឱកាសល្អទៀតដែររឺទេ?

អ្វីដែលខ្ញុំចង់ប្រាប់នោះ គឺខ្ញុំមិនចង់អោយបងប្អូនខាត​ ពេលវេលា អស់លុយ ហើយមិនបានផល។ ខ្ញុំចង់អោយបងប្អូន អាច​រកលុយបានក្នុងរយៈ ពេលខ្លីៗ មិនចំនាយពេល ឥតប្រយោជន៏ ដោយគ្រាន់ តែមកសិក្សា ជាមួយខ្ញុំ ដែលជាមនុស្សបានជោគជ័យខ្លះ រួចទៅហើយ។

សូមទូរសព្ទ័ មកលេខខាងក្រោម ដើម្បីបានព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម!

job title: វគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ
position: វគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ
Job Description:
សួស្តីអ្នកដែលមានចក្ខុវិស័យ ក្នុងការរកលុយតាម អនឡាញទាំងអស់គ្នា! ខ្ញុំដឹងថាមានប្រជាជនខ្មែរយើង ជាច្រើនដែលចង់សំរាក នៅផ្ទះ តែចង់បាន លុយហូរចូលច្រើនជា រៀងរាល់ខែ។ ខ្ញុំមិននិយាយថា ខ្ញុំជាមនុស្សពូកែ រឺ យ៉ាងណានោះទេ ក៏ប៉ុន្តែយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ ខ្ញុំបានរកឃើញ​នូវ គន្លឹសសំខាន់ៗ ជាច្រើនដែលអាចធ្វើអោយខ្ញុំ មានប្រាក់ចំនូល សមល្មមជារៀងរាល់ខែ ដោយគ្រាន់តែអង្គុយ នៅទីណា មួយក៏បាន អោយតែមាន Laptop និង​ Internet នោះជាការស្រេច។

ខ្ញុំតែងតែមានចក្ខុវិស័យ ចង់បាន មុខជំនួញមួយដែល ខុសពីអ្នកដ៏ទៃ បានន័យថា ភាគច្រើនមនុស្សគ្រប់គ្នា កំពុងតែធ្វើការអោយថៅកែ យ៉ាងសកម្ម តែចំពោះខ្ញុំវិញ កំពុងអង្គុយផឹកកាហ្វេ នៅក្នុង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ស្តាប់ចំរៀងពិរោះៗ តែលុយនៅហូរចូល ច្រើនៗ។ នេះជាលក្ខណៈពិសេស នៃការរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ។

ដោយសារតែខ្ញុំដឹងថា បងប្អូនទាំងអស់មានបំនង ចង់សិក្សាវិធីដែលរកលុយ តាមអនឡាញ ដូចខ្ញុំច្រើននាក់ពេក ទើបខ្ញុំសំរេចចិត្តបង្កើតវគ្គ សិក្សាខ្លី​ អំពីរបៀបរកលុយតាមអនឡាញ។

ហេតុអ្វីត្រូវចាំបាច់រៀន គ្រាន់តែស្រាវជ្រាវ អនឡាញក៏បានដែរ!!!

Job Description:
1. Inbound call
• Respond to customer inquiries by following the customer service standard and script provided
by ABA Bank.
• Research required information using available resources (if assigned by Head of department)
• Handle/ resolve customer complaints (if doable in your level) and/or Identify and escalate
priority issues/complaints to the right person of the units which a complaint/issue raised to.
• Perform your role and contact point from the client to follow up and close the complaint/issue.
Follow‐up customer calls where necessary
• Provide customers with product and service information, terms and conditions if asked by the
client.
• Route calls to appropriate departments if a query/complaint is not manageable within your
discretions.
• Complete call logs and prepare call reports on the timely manner.

2. Outbound Calls
• Contact businesses or private individuals by phone to survey about the service provided by ABA
Bank.
• Deliver prepared sales scripts to persuade potential customers to purchase a product or service
if you are asked.
• Describe products and services, respond to questions, identify for the opportunity for sales,
obtain customer information, and refer sales opportunity to Relationship Manager/ Consultant.
• Data entry and maintenance of customer/potential customer data bases
• Follow‐up on initial contacts
• Maintain records of telephonic interactions, orders and accounts
• Keep a close eye on your local competitors – what they do and how they perform. Plan to gain
market share.
• Keep up to date with ABA’s products suite and marketing campaigns to ensure superior product
knowledge.
Job Requirement:
• Organizational and time management skills
• Ability to work effectively in a team environment
• Sound written and verbal communication skills
• High degree of self‐motivation and excellent interpersonal skills
• Computer literacy
• Understanding of basic banking products and services
• Practical knowledge of operating risk and compliance policies and procedures

Job Description:
1. Keep stock control system update with accurate data.
2. Solve daily issues, challenges of goods storage in the warehouse
3. Manage the daily activities of inventory staff
4. Manage with inventory counting to cycle when inventory staffs go to checking in store
5. Report all inventory condition to management team 
6. Clear and check inventory report with other consignment or related department.
7. Coordinate work schedule to ensure timely and effective completion of projects.
8. Work to support with Accounting Manager and Inventory Account
9. Directly lead or monitor inventory staff about accomplishment daily report.
10. Ensure those warehouse are well prepared such as ordinary space, equipment, sanitation and hygiene.
11. Control inventory staff to ensure that warehouse’s policies and procedures conduct is correctly.
12. Monitor all compile report before sent to related department
13. Prepare and make compile report daily/ weekly/ monthly to accounting department
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor degree in Management / Accounting / Financial and Banking or relevant degree
2. At least 2 years working experience as Warehouse/Inventory in garments Manufacturing 
4. Fluently in English, Khmer communication skills both written and spoken.
5. Knowledge of Microsoft office 
6. Knowledge of methods and principles for inventory management, Manage and maintain appropriate inventory level and products loss, damage etc…
7. Honest, hardworking, confidential, responsibility, polite, sincerely, friendly Creative and flexible in work.
8. High personal integrity, morality and prudence and maintain confidentiality with internal information

Interested applicants should submit a cover letter and CV, together with their expected salary and other supporting documents to bellow email address ppmr@volumecocomo.com . Only short listed applicants will be contacted for interview. Competitive salary will be offered based on qualifications and experiences
Company Profile: VolumeCocomo Apparel, Inc. is a premier full service wholesaler and manufacturer of knit and woven apparel offering our customers the convenience of one stop shopping. Being a vertical operation enables us to meet today's rigorous market demands. Our offices in New York, LA, China, Korea and Cambodia are fully staffed to support the needs of our clients beginning with design research and product development as well as fabric, print and trim sourcing and strict quality assurance. The process is expertly monitored every step of the way

Job Description:
Deadline: 20 December 2013

-Develop the Standardize written documentation related to the credit and customer set up process such as Policy and Manual of Credit Control
-Review and revised the Policy and Manual of the Credit Control to comply with the current and future situation
-Develop the standardize criteria of loan requirement such as customer conditions and requirement documents

-Creative and innovative

Company Profile:
ODI Asia is a business consultancy firm specialized in Human Resources Management. ODI Asia offers quality, professional & expert services: the three key characteristics our clients identified to help them best meet their challenges. We help our clients achieve commercial success through unlocking their people potential. ODI Asia has extensive experience servicing local and international private companies, non-government organizations (NGOs), community-based organizations (CBOs), donors and governments.

Address:No. 33-34, St. 114, Bayon Building, 4th Floor, Room: 406, Sangkat Monorom, Khan 7 Makara, 1225
Mobile Phone: (855) 77 333 423 / (855) 77 333 424 (Recruitment & Selection)
Email: recruitment@odi­‐asia.com
Web Site: www.odi-­asia.com

ODI Asia is governed by an international board of directors who provide ongoing advice and support.
At ODI Asia we listen, analyze and advise our clients - we assess our clients’ needs and develop solutions with our talented staff, advisors and trainers. We have an excellent track record of developing long-standing relationships with leading companies and NGOs to:
    Work in partnership with our clients to assess our client's needs, learn from each other, and develop an ongoing relationship.
    Combine our expertise with a pragmatic, down-to-earth approach to deliver solutions that meet the unique needs of each client.
    Be accountable to our clients and deliver what we promise – that is why our clients come back to us again and again.

Our team is comprised of professionals deeply committed to enhancing the organizational capacity and professional lives of our clients. Our rich and varied operational experience within a broad range of business and development sectors means not only can we coach and encourage the growth and development of our clients but we can also take a holistic approach.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Sonida   077333423/4 No. 33-34, St. 114, Bayon Building, 4th Floor, Room: 406, Sangkat Monorom, Khan 7 Makara, 12251 Phnom Penh (New Location)  077333423/4

Job Description:
Deadline: 20 December 2013

-Manage cash, liquidity, and funding in all currencies for the group by pooling, sweeping, supporting, etc
-Ensure all payment and settlement obligation on a timely basis under both normal and stress condition
-Estimate expected daily gross liquidity inflows, outflows, and anticipate the intraday timing with understanding the rules of all payment and settlement systems
-Act as in-house bank that is highly efficient with high volume of transaction across multiple legal entities and tax regimes
-Understand the available avenues and access fund and fund availability from funding market including repos, FX arbitrage funding and transfer pricing for Foreign Currency Deposits
-Monitor and adverse developments that may potentially affected the bank’s ability to raise funds

-Degree holder with finance, accounting, economics qualification or related disciplines
-5 years’ solid relevant experience gained in the banking industry
-Excellent analytical skills and advanced spreadsheet skills
-Strong communication skills for effective interaction with front office, middle office and operations colleagues
-Excellent command in both verbal and written English

Job Description:
Cambodian Children’s Fund is an international non-profit organization having been established in Cambodia since June 2004. Our mission is to break cycles of poverty and abuse and to create positive change in Cambodia through intervention and education for the most impoverished and underserved children and their families by providing services such as education, childcare, health care, vocational training and community outreach.  There are 8 different facilities with 468 staffs undertaking various projects in Phnom Penh. We are currently seeking a qualified candidate to fill the following position: 

Volunteer Project Officer 
One position based in Phnom Penh

CORE RESPONSIBILITIES:
-	Model the organisation’s values and behaviours 
        within the office, with reference to the 
        organisational policy and procedures
-	Manage an array of administrative tasks 
        including:
       o Undertake word processing, spread sheets, 
         report writing, correspondence and associated 
         documentation in a timely, accurate and 
         efficient manner, utilising appropriate 
         grammar, spelling and lay-out.
       o Manage the office mail flow, aware of the 
         importance of meeting timelines
       o Create and support implementation of schedules 
         for multiple simultaneous volunteers and/or 
         visitors
       o Accurately maintain electronic and hard copy 
         files and records
-	Continually demonstrate well developed oral and 
        written communication skills, appreciating 
        diversity and different personality types, 
        either in person or via phone/email 
        communication
-	Demonstrate competence in all Word packages, 
        including Excel, presenting documents in a 
        professional manner
-	Represent CCF  and the CCF Volunteering 
        Department positively by planning and managing 
        own workload to ensure an efficient and timely 
        response to requests, especially handling 
        emergency situations professionally
-	Manage application processes, including liaison 
        with a range of stakeholders on a local and 
        international level. 
-	Demonstrate critical attention to detail to 
        ensure compliance with requirements, collating 
        a vast and complex array of documentation
-	Demonstrate self-awareness, initiative and 
        professionalism by contributing to an 
        harmonious working environment, working 
        collaboratively as a cohesive team.  
-	Contribute to quality assurance and continual 
        improvement by initiating and contributing to 
        streamlining administrative systems and 
        procedures
Job Requirement:
-	Visibly ethical, able to demonstrate CCF values 
        in day-to-day work
-	Contribute to quality assurance and continual 
        improvement by initiating and contributing to 
        streamlining administrative systems and 
        procedures.
-	Able to professionally and successfully 
        communicate with diverse clients and 
        stakeholders at all levels 
-	Well-developed IT skills. Competence in all 
        Word packages.
-	Able to understand differing stakeholder needs 
        and respond in a way which demonstrates a 
        commitment to client satisfaction
-	Demonstrated systems thinking and an ability to 
        balance a  conceptual overview with critical 
        attention to detail, demonstrating 
        assertiveness to enable job completion in a 
        timely way
-	Able to understand oneself, to appreciate 
        difference and to build successful team 
        relationships to ensure effective 
        administration processes
-	Able to respond to arising issues and 
        contribute to quality improvement projects and 
        initiatives


Interested candidates are encouraged to send CV and Cover Letter via email. Please see the following details: 
Sent To	        : job.cambodia@gmail.com 
Subject		: Apply for Position Volunteer Project  
                  Officer  
Attached        : CV and CL, (Do not attach copies of 
                  certificates to the e-mail but bring 
                  them when called for interview).

Contact Number 	: 023 678 5551
Deadline        : 12 / December / 2013
Result          : Only shortlisted candidates will be 
                  notified. Documents submitted will 
                  not be returned.
Website         : www.cambodianchildrensfund.org
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070 666 089 House # 222, Street # 6BT, Sangkat Boeung Tumpun, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh  070 666 089

Company Profile:
DFI Lucky Private Limited is a member of Dairy Farm International Group, one of the region’s most respected retailers, currently running 6,500 outlets and over 180,000 employees. In Cambodia, we’re operating a successful chain of branded subsidiaries including Supermarket and Health & Beauty stores.

DFI Lucky Private Limited is the leading retail business in Cambodia which operates mostly 100 stores throughout the country and employs more than 1,300 team members.
Lucky operates Supermarkets and Express stores offering wide ranges of Fresh foods, Grocery and non-food items with many imported and exclusive brands that are only available at Lucky in Cambodia. Store coverage continues to expand through the city in Phnom Penh, and also in Siem Reap and Battambang.  

Guardian currently operates many locations throughout the city in Phnom Penh and in Siem Reap with wide ranges of Cosmetics, Beauty, Skin Care and health care products. Guardian also imports many products the Guardian brand which are exclusive to Guardian in South East Asia. Guardian continues to open stores in Cambodia and also operates small stores within Lucky Supermarkets or Express stores in selected locations.

Job Description:

•	Overall custodian of HSE and technical documents & records.

•	Good communication skills in Khmer and in English.

job title: Primary School Teacher (01 post), based in Phnom Penh.
position: Primary School Teacher (01 post), based in Phnom Penh.
Job Description:
Responsibilities

- Teach primary school level (grade 5 and grade 6) to PSE students 
- Update and develop lessons and teaching materials by integrating between PSE and MoEYS program/ curriculum
- Write lesson plan based on PSE format
- Develop monthly test, semester exam, and other quizzes
- Record and follow up individual students both study quality and discipline and then advise/ coach them accordingly
- Control and manage discipline of classroom and student behavior to ensure students actively participate in the classroom and well behave
- Write a report for school manager
Job Requirement:
Requirements
- Possess primary pedagogy certificate
- Minimum two year teaching experiences
- Love teaching to vulnerable children
- Well-organized, flexible, patient and dynamic
- IT literate (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Ms. PowerPoint…)
- Be able to communicate in English
- Respect and support the mission and value of PSE 

Benefits

Competitive salary, retirement benefits, family health supporting, insurance, and training will be provided to successful candidates.
Company Profile:
Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) is a non-profit organization, established at the end of 1995 in Cambodia, working to provide food, shelter, medical care, general education and vocational training to children needing support, e.g. underprivileged children; maltreated children; children living in poverty and children without any formal education in Phnom Penh, Sihanoukville and Siem Reap. 

Currently PSE is providing help to more than 6,500 children, supporting around 3,000 children in public schools, 1,500 in the remedial education program, and 1,500 in the vocational training program. Around 500 children benefit from specific educational programs: classes for children with disability, day-care centers, infant welfare etc.

PSE employs more than 500 dedicated staff. Due to rapid growth of existing and new programs, PSE is seeking candidates for the position of Gardener (01 post), based in Phnom Penh.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ya Sarin  023 995 660  No 402, Trea Village, Sangkat Stung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, P.O. Box 2107, Phnom Penh 3  023 995 660

Job Description:
We are a well-known beverage manufacturer in Cambodia. Due to business needs, we are now seeking for a seasoned beverage production manager for juice to lead our dynamic and fast-paced growth business. 

Responsibilities:

Reporting to the Senior Executive Vice President, you will be responsible for overseeing the production management of our beverage facility as a whole. You will lead in the planning and execution of production and distribution to ensure delivery at customers’ requirements.In addition, you will be entrusted with leading capacity analysis,production and process development improvement to ensure quality compliance with company and statutory requirements at the same time drive process re-engineering for cost reduction measures and efficiency improvement to meet the business objectives of the Company and the market demand.


To ensure long term sustainability and scalable business development, you are tasked with the leadership to initiate people management of the team to up-skill and develop their abilities to meet with the long term development of the company.  


Requirements:

•	The ideal candidate should be a degree holder in Food Technology, Food Science, Nutrition or related field 
•	With a minimum of 10 years of experience in Food & Beverage industry preferably in juice production, with at least 5 years in managerial position gained from sizeable organizations such asF & N or Yeo’s
•	Familiar with beverage manufacturing process, ISO 9001, HACCP, GMP  Certification and other food safety standards
•	Self-motivated, creative, innovative strategic business thinker and able to work under tight deadlines
•	Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment
•	Highly effective, dynamic, result oriented and proactive
•	Excellent problem solving and planning skills with strong leadership
•	Strong  interpersonal and communication, and organization skills
•	Knowledge of 6 Sigma, Lean 6 Sigma, Kaizen, etc is an advantage
•	Fluency in written and spoken English and Khmer, understand other Asian languages will be an added advantage
•	Proficiency in using MS word, excel, PowerPoint, etc.
Job Requirement: The successful candidate will be offered with competitive salary and fringe benefits with excellent career prospects. Interested parties please forward your resume with covering letter in MS word form stating your work history, current and expected salary, availability and contact phone number to hrexe@hqgtrading.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  (Cellcard) 085 585 288/ (Smart) 096 812 1116 P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao TseToung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh.  (Cellcard) 085 585 288/ (Smart) 096 812 1116

Job Description:
We are a well-known distributing company carrying various product categories ranging from steel, cement to consumer goods. To cope with our business expansion, we are looking for an experienced logistics expert to join our dynamic and exciting team.


Reporting to the VP ofSupply Chain, you will lead and developthe logistics team to manage the whole order fulfillment cycle from goods receipt to delivery to provide for timely logistics solutions for customers.


You will formulate policies and set operating procedures for inventory, warehouse and logistics management and to supervise the daily operations including transportation arrangement, stock control, warehousing and the movement & storage of goods to ensure the distribution and warehousing operations are at all times efficient and effective. To continuously review all aspects of the operations including logistics flow, procedure and SOPto achieve and improve internal Key Performance Indicators to meet the business objectives of the Company.To regularly prepare various reports and analysis including logistics budget report and provide recommendations for management review. 


Requirements:

•	To be successful, you will have a minimum of 10 year experience in logistics management of which 5 years at managerial levelgained from sizeable organizations
•	Degree holder in Logistics Management, Supply Chain Management or related disciplines.
•	Experience in international logistics management with  Asian exposure will be an advantage
•	Familiarwith SAP ERP system is highly desired but not mandatory
•	Able to work under pressure to meet tight schedule
•	Highly effective, dynamic, andresult-oriented with strong sense of responsibility 
•	Excellent planning, organiaztion, and analytical skills with detailed mind
•	Self-motivated, proactive with good communications and people management skills
•	Good command of both spoken and written English and Khmer, knowledge of other Asian languages is a plus
•	Proficiency in Microsoft office application
Job Requirement: Successful candidate will be offered competitive remuneration package with excellent career prospects. Interested parties please forward in MS word form your employment history with covering letter stating your current and expected salary, availability and contact phone number to hrexe@hqgtrading.com

Job Description:
Riverkids is now looking for qualified candidates to fill the position of senior social worker.

Job Purpose
The senior social worker will work support social team, education, health and micro-business team to selects and recruits clients, identity critical family and facility workshop for community.

Core responsibilities

Senior Social Worker Duties:

-	Work incorporate with Internal and external education team leader and teachers to follow up students who absent to ensure they come to study regularly.
-	Assist to identify a crisis case of child and family in community and inform to team to meet and find a solution to help them.
-	Assist social worker team and other units to recruit child, adults and women into Riverkids program as needed and make sure to match the deadline (Get ready girl, vocational training, Internal Riverkids  school)
-	Keep informs difficult case to management team for help.
-	Work coordinate with Social Worker team to prepare training course on community and housemother related on domestic violence, Alcohol addicted, and introduction to human trafficking and so on to children and families.

-	Communication Duties:
-	Collaborate with communication in social team, other units and family who are clients.
-	Communication with family and children
-	Writing reports
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 
-	Bachelor degree in Psychology/Social Worker or related fields.
-	3-4 years experience in recruitment and hiring functions.
-	Has worked in the field previously
-	Good computer literacy (Microsoft Word, Excel).
-	Good English both in writing and speaking; 
-	An ability to adapt communication styles to a diverse audience and a complex environment.
-	Be honest, trustworthy, open mind, reliable, self-motivated, organized and have good communication skills.
-	Experience in non – profit organization a must
-	Ethical and understanding the importance of compliance and high standards

We offer
-	Rewarding work with interesting challenges
-	Being part of committed professional team. 
-	Gaining new experience as working for an established NGO respected within the community.
-	Job-related training
-	Highly competitive pay package with health insurance and an annual bonus.

How to apply
Interested candidates are requested to submit their CV and cover letter to human resource department by email hr@riverkidsproject.org or using the address below. Do not attach copies of certificates via mail. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.

For more information, please contact us by 011 799 037. We encourage you to learn more about us at www.riverkidsproject.org// www.facebook.com/Riverkids

Job Description:
Vacancy Type:Work Experience:Age: Oligo Trading Co., Ltd is the leading cosmetic product and beauty treatment service company in Cambodia. Our brands are various world-class cosmetic products including DIBI (Italy), Ericson (Paris), Oligodermie (Paris), Phyto (Paris), and famous beauty center Megabelle. With our extensive experiences in this industry, we are distributing and supplying: the clinical, the professional and the retail cosmetic and hair products to several leading pharmacies, solon and spa centers and potential outlets. With the quick growing business, we are looking for candidates to fill the position of IT Manager to expand our IT team. 

SUMMARY: Responsible for overall planning, organizing, and execution of all IT functions for Oligo Trading Co., Ltd, both Oligo Cosmetic and Megabelle Centers. This includes directing all IT operations to meet company’s requirements as well as the support and maintenance of existing infrastructure, applications, and development of new technical solutions. 

Major Responsibilities
- Report to BDD and GM
- Provide leadership, vision, and management to the IT department
- Work with the Software companies and staff to assess and respond to IT needs
- Manage an IT staff of three people
- Hold departmental meetings to review strategic goals and initiatives, promote team building and work to provide growth paths for staff
- Provide day-to-day supervision, conduct performance appraisals, and delegate work assignments for all IT personnel
- Assist in recruiting, hiring, and providing appropriate training for IT support staff
- Serve on planning and policy-making committees.
- Oversee the development, design, and implementation of new applications and changes to existing computer systems and software packages.
- Responsible for the ordering, acquisition, inventorying, and disposition of hardware and software
- Serve as primary contact with outside vendors in the generation of RFPs, bids, contracts, agreements, and other major vendor interactions, Systems Operations and Maintenance
- Maintain the integrity and continual operation of the IT network including the wireless networks
- Maintain security and privacy of the information systems, communication lines, and equipment.
- Develop, review, and certify all back-up and disaster recovery procedures and plans
- Other duties, not listed, may be assigned by the management.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree of Information Technology
- At least 4 years progressive experience in IT role including 2 years in a leadership role
- Strong understanding of installation, maintenance, hardware and software
- Strong understanding about network management and infrastructure 
- Honesty, initiative, flexibility, commitment and good inter-personal skills.
- Fluent Speaking, Listening, Reading and Writing in English
- Ability to write IT policies in English and Khmer
- Strong problem solving skills
- Able to work under pressure and limited deadline
Company Profile:
Oligo Trading Co., Ltd is the leading cosmetic product and beauty treatment service company in Cambodia. Our brands are various world-class cosmetic products including DIBI (Italy), Ericson (Paris), Oligodermie (Paris), Phyto (Paris), and beauty center a famous Megabelle.Italy), Ericson (Paris), Oligodermie (Paris), Phyto (Paris), and beauty center a famous Megabelle. With our extensive experiences in this industry, we are distributing and supplying: the clinical, the professional and the retail cosmetic and hair products to several leading pharmacies, solon and spa centers and potential outlets.

Job Description:
About Riverkids
Riverkids is a secular local non-governmental organization registered in 2007 with board of directors in Singapore. We work with children and families in danger of abuse and trafficking in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. We identify children at high risk because of extreme poverty, drug abuse, alcoholism, gambling, child abuse or other children or family involved in trafficking. We are now looking for qualified candidates to fill the position ofPrograms Director.

Job Purpose
TheRecruitment Coordinator will work to support Micro-Business Coordinator and programmanager to network NGO partners and other stakeholder to support people we are supporting to access skills training and job placement.

Core responsibilities

Recruitment Coordinator Duties:

-	Work to networking with NGO partners to find the skills training, follow up, and find internship and job for people under Riverkids’ support after graduated.
-	Coordinate to search available job in markets
-	Coordinate and manage to do job orientation or preparation for our clients in order for new position.
-	Work closely with other teams to support our clients to prepare the curriculum vitae for applying for job.
-	Coordinator with other teams to find the market for selling School Uniform and handicraft products
-	Work to support Micro-Business Coordinator and program manager to evaluate outcome levels of our clients’ families.

-	Communication Duties:
-	Collaborate with communication/volunteer build  a network with other NGOs in Cambodia
-	Advocate about our cause 
-	Writing reports of project/program
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 
-	Bachelor degree in Project Management, Administration managementor related fields.
-	2-3 years experiences in recruitment and hiring functions.
-	Has worked in the field previously
-	Good computer literacy (Microsoft Word, Excel).
-	Good English both in writing and speaking; 
-	An ability to adapt communication styles to a diverse audience and a complex environment.
-	Be honest, trustworthy, open mind, reliable, self-motivated, organizedand have good communication skills.
-	Experience in non – profit organization a must
-	Ethical and understanding the importance of compliance and high standards

We offer
-	Rewarding work with interesting challenges
-	Being part of committed professional team.

-	Job-related training

Job Description:
Nokor Group is an IT company based in Phnom Penh since 2007, driven by a dedicated Cambodian and international management team, fluent in Khmer, English and French languages, and a full team of high profiles of Cambodian consultants and engineers.
Nokor Group has the know-how acquired through extensive experiences in the tertiary industry such as bank, finance, credit, leasing, health and insurance sectors whose applications require precision and scalability and a flawless performance.

For 2014, we are looking for long term collaboration IT engineers wishing to work in a challenging and a highly technology environment and in a professional atmosphere.

The end-selected candidate will receive accelerated training on the required knowledge for the related work.
Job Requirement:
Duties
- Read and analyze functional specifications provided by customers
- Develop functionalities according to the functional specifications
- Fix bugs raised by customers or by the teams
- Write technical documentation in English.
- Communicate with managers and other team members

Essential Requirements
- Have at least a Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Diploma of Engineering
- Have a methodological and team spirit
- Have at least one year professional experience in Java/.NET/PHP programming
- Have at least one year experience in the web application development
- Understand OOP programming

Job Description:
• To ensure the delivery of exceptional operational and commercial standards throughout stores and drive sales and profitability through the performance and development of store personnel, whilst managing within agreed budgets. 
• To do this by maximizing time in units and minimizing time at head office.
Job Requirement:
1.To complete store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
2.To maintain store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
3.To maintain store staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
4.To identify current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and actual customers and other persons in a position to understand service requirements.
5.To protect employees and customers by providing a safe and clean store environment.
6.To Maintain operations by initiating, coordinating, and enforcing program, operational, and personnel policies and procedures.
7.To contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
8.To support the management of customer service activities and staff competence so as to optimize and sustain sales performance and customer satisfaction,
9.To clearly and concisely communicate business and Area objectives to managers so that they remain well informed of business activity and of their required contribution to targets, 
10.To achieve stock control targets inline with company guidelines to prevent financial loss,
11.To liaise with the Buying and Merchandising teams regarding the supply of stock in the store to maximize stock potential,
12.To identify under performing stores and develop a business plan to address and manage issues effectively,
13.To collate and provide constructive feedback on VM standards to the business,
14.To ensure that the visual presentation of all stores represents the brand image,
15.To support the delivery of all marketing campaigns,
16.To effectively manage the performance and development of store personnel to drive and maximize the sale performance throughout the shop
17.To plan for succession of the shop through the identification of individuals with potential for development and growth,

Innovation: Our team members have a breadth of skills, talents and experience developing products in a variety of human resources, accounting, and other mission-critical applications. Our culture is one that promotes free-thinking, creativity, and enthusiasm.

Certainty: We work with you to create a thorough and accurate requirement definition to ensure there are no unnecessary surprises and that projects complete on time and within budget.

Why Choose CAMS?

Choosing a professional management company that your company will ultimately be partnering with is not something to be taken lightly. Florida American School – FAS is a legal private school of Khmer and English languages which contributes to the development of the next generation. Job Description:
•Adapt Danone recruiting communication actions to the local market/develop local recruiting communication actions 
•Build and implement a long-term and flexible sourcing policy which involves operation managers
•Develop long-term relationships with partners (schools, universities, recruitment firms…)
•Build and share a spirit of talents’ sourcing with operational managers (permanent watch-out…)
•Evaluate suitability of applicants’ to Danone and the BU needs
•Challenge operational managers to question their recruiting needs and elaborate accurate job and profile descriptions 
•Coach operational managers to become professional interviewers
•Build and follow-up the BU recruiting plans and budgets
•Understand market trends & business needs and transform that knowledge into development plans at corporate and individual level
•Analyze future versus current level of competency of staff
•Transform competency gap analysis into training plan
•Develop and launch competency development training programs or actions
•Measure and follow-up competency development programs, and take corrective actions
•Use training as a tool to facilitate the management of change
•Maintain and develop the “employability” of all categories of employees, by implementing Danone qualification policy
•Use training programs to implement and reinforce Danone values and business principles at all employee levels
•To assist to monitor the HIRIS systems for HR to aid in service delivery and workforce analysis

A. Communication Skill

Time Management

l. Planning and Organizing

Job Description:
● Oversee all aspect of the organizational human resource support service, administrative initiative and public relation
● Be responsible for preparing recruitment and selection process to provide qualified candidates for all vacancies
● Develop and update HR Policies, internal rule, work process and guidelines to ensure human resource function is effectively and efficiently carried out
● Overlook on the implementation of HR policies, rule and regulation and procedure to ensure they are correctly practised for the whole organization 
● Perform HR task such as problem solving, payroll activity, backup and succession planning, staff training and development, motivation and performance appraisal and job analyse
● Maintain employee database and compile statistic report regarding personnel related data such as hiring, transfer, warning, termination and absenteeism 
● Manage staff benefit, employment contract, personnel file and related file documents
● Provide advice and counsel to the management regarding internal or external factor affecting the company’s human resource management
● Liaise with the public authorities to ensure admin/HR policies are in compliance with the Cambodia labour law
● Perform other duties as assigned by the management team
Job Requirement:
•Master degree in HRM, Management or related fields 
•At least 5 year experience of Human Resource Management 
•Disciplined self-starter, creative thinking, analysis, good personality and communication
•Have excellent managerial, supervisory and inter-personal skills, highly-developed communication skills
•Experience in managing staff and administration and a strong commitment to education service
•Knowledge of English and MS office (work, excel)

Job Description:
PURPOSE STATEMENT:

As Head of Sales & Marketing, you will hold a senior position within the organization and report to the CEO. It is expected that you will   through increasing the managed the business. You will be expected to recruit and train staff in sales and marketing techniques and ensure these are applied consistently through the organization as well as reviewing all sales and management contracts that are generated. Developing and implementing short and long term marketing strategies, your primary objective will be to grow the brand in the markets.

PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:

• Hand and hand work with Local & International Advertising agency to make sure deliverables are met.

• Provide strategic marketing support for New Business sales team.

• Design sales targets and sale quotas and make sure they are met on a monthly basis.

• Coordinate sales activities with other work units or departments

• Assist with marketing/data analysis training, where necessary

• Utilize data (i.e. prospect, competitor) to create reports designed to determine target market, market potential, directory potential; identify new targets, markets and opportunities. Identify marketing opportunities by matching customer requirements to existing products or future opportunities.

• Stay abreast of industry trends and assess market and competition products/services

• Develop goals and objectives, projects and priorities and assign them to Sales Manager

• Develop and conduct sales campaigns, as well as marketing and promotional plans

• Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•Bachelors Degree in related field preferred.
A passion for research, critical thinking, analysis, and Press Release writing is required.
•5 years experience in a corporate/sales/marketing environment.
•Experience creating client presentations.
•Knowledge of customer demographics and ability to predict customer behaviour.
•Preferably experience in Print/prepaid/GSM/Television and Ad agency.
•Must be able to work with diverse people, be organized and be able to multi-task. (a must).
•Must have knowledge of marketing in the media industry (pricing risk analysis/promotions etc)
•Possess interviewing, coaching and mentoring skills.
•Must have international marketing (advertising/product management/promotions/branding)
experience.
•Must be mature and able to work independently with little supervision.
•Superior written and verbal communications skills.
•Strong project management skills in launching media valued added services, event coordination and product management

job title: Office For Works, Maintemance And Supplies(500U$-700U$) (Urgent)
position: Office For Works, Maintemance And Supplies(500U$-700U$) (Urgent)
Job Description:
Responsibilities
The office for works, Maintenance and Supplies is responsible for all constructions and equipment and manages a team of more than 30 people (Maintenance staff, cooks, cleaners and driver). 
Maintenance:
•	Establish an annual plan of the preventive maintenance.
•	With the Administrative and Financial Director and his assistant, elaborates the annual plan of equipment requirements (replacement or new equipment).
•	Evaluate the repair works in case of deterioration or breakdown of equipment.
•	Prepare the orders, looks for the best supplies and proposes cost estimate. 
Intendance:
•	Organize the weekly schedule of the whole staff in charge of, and particular events (Visits, distributions…) and communicates information to the team.
•	Organize transports depending on the staff and visitor’s needs.
•	Validate the menus and purchase plans with the chief cook.
Security Hygiene:
•	In accordance with regulations and the school demands, the office for work develops security plans and proposes hygiene measures for staff and pupils. 
•	Be able to make sure that team respects security and hygiene riles.
Administration:
•	Maintenance the inventory of product stocks (stationary, maintenance products, small equipment…) and the inventory of durable goods.
•	Look for and proposes suppliers get cost estimates and prepare purchase requests. 
•	Order and receives goods. 
•	Deal with staff schedule, priorities and possible hazards.
•	Prepare information for the insurance contract for goods and equipment.
•	Write an activities report.
Job Requirement:
•	At least similar experience of 3-5 years, which would enable to work independently and bring a new method. 
•	Experience in a hotel establishment, a school or n a maintenance or construction firm.
•	Knows how to make the staff accept the demands and how to find ingenious solution to face hazards and still respecting a tight budget.
•	Be honest, thorough and precise, knows how to plans the mission, depending on the deadline to respect and the needs of the users.
•	In addition to Khmer language, French or English language.
•	Microsoft office and computer tools that uses to be more efficient in the work.

Job Description:
1. Administer compensation, benefits and performance management systems, and safety and recreation programs
2. Identify staff vacancies and recruit, interview and select applicants.
3. Allocate human resources, ensuring appropriate matches between personnel
4. Provide current and prospective employees with information about policies, job duties, working conditions, wages, opportunities for promotion and employee benefits
5. Perform difficult staffing duties, including dealing with understaffing, refereeing disputes, firing employees, and administering disciplinary procedures
6.  Advise managers on organizational policy matters such as equal employment opportunity
7. Analyze and modify compensation and benefits policies to establish competitive programs and ensure compliance with legal requirements
8. Plan and conduct new employee orientation to foster positive attitude toward organizational objectives
9. Serve as a link between management and employees by handling questions, interpreting and administering contrcats and helping resolve work related problems
10. Plan, direct, supervise, and coordonate work activities of subordinates and staff relating to employment, compensation, labor relations, and employee relations.
11. Analyze training needs to design employee development, language training and health and safety programs
12. Maintain records and follow reports related employees datas, such as hires, transfers, performance appraisals, and absenteeism
13. Analyze datas and reports to identify and determine causes of personnel problems and develop recommandations for improvement of policies and practices
14. Plan, organize, direct, control the personnel, training, or labor relations activities of the company
15. Conduct exit interviews to identify reasons for employee termination 16. Investigate and report on industrial questions and needs
16. Prepare personnel forecast to project employment needs
17. Prepare and follow budgets for personnel operations
18. Oversee the evaluation, classification and rating of occupations and job positions
19.  Contract with vendors to provide employee services
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree and strong experience in HR.

- More than 3 years of professional experience which involved for program planning, organization, implementation and operation in HR administration programs, including more than 2 years supervisory/management responsibility. Working in an international environment a plus but not a requirement.

 Interested candidates, please submit CV and Cover Letter  via email admin@cmyk.com.kh. Only shortlist candidates will be notified and contacted by phone for interview.

Job Description:
• Perform laboratory tests as requested by clinic providers according to the highest possible standards.
• Maintain a high standard of infection control in the laboratory. 
• Ensure the availability of an adequate stock of reagents and supplies at all times. 
• Be responsible for preventive maintenance of laboratory equipment and preparation of the inventory of laboratory equipment and furniture.
Job Requirement:
• Laboratory Technician’s Certificate from the School of Nursing.
• A minimum of two years experience as a Lab technician in a reputed medical institution. Familiarity with reproductive health issues, an advantage.
• A working knowledge of English. 
• Good computer skills in Word, Excel and Power-point. 
• Pleasing personality and a strong sensitivity to the needs of patients. 
• Good inter-personal communication skills
• Willing to travel in the field, if required. 
• Willing to work flexible hours.


All interested candidates should apply by completing the RHAC Application Form attached with CV, Cover Letter and state clearly about the position you want to apply to the Human Resources Department at Reproductive Health Association of Cambodia Headquarters, address: #14, St. 335, Boeung Kak I commune, Toul Kork district, Phnom Penh or via Email: jobs@rhac.org.kh, Tel: 023 883 769.
For the details of this position and application form are available at the RHAC office and website: www.rhac.org.kh.   
RHAC is an equal opportunity organization and women are encouraged to apply.
The deadline of application submission is by December 09, 2013 by 5:00PM. 
Only short-listed candidates will be invited for interview. Submitted documents will not be returned. 

RHAC abides by strict child protection policies and does not tolerate child abuse.
Company Profile:
Reproductive Health Association of Cambodia (RHAC) is a leading NGO focusing on health including Sexual and Reproductive Health, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health, TB, HIV/ AIDS, communicable and non-communicable diseases; implementing projects in 14 provinces in Cambodia. 

All the services of RHAC are based on the gender and reproductive health equality. 

RHAC is currently seeking a talented and committed qualified Cambodian candidate to fill the below position in our organization.

Job Description:
The mission of NEWPEX is to produce and distribute quality bags to customers around the world.The company now expanding its production capacity in Cambodia, and looking for suitable qualified persons in the position of Production Manager 01 Positions). 

- To check production line and make report.
- To check and handle Incentive reports and target payment to workers. 
- To check work progress of workers. 
- Instruct workers in production line. 
- To maintain excellent work relationships with various operators and suppliers. 
- To ensure operation activities are fully compliant with the Client Standard Committed to the agreed timeline with reliable data quality. 
- To maintain good relationships and work proactively with counter-parts (both internal and external) to ensure operation excellence. 
- To supervisor and monitor cleaners, securities, and check their daily activities, and report to Factory Manager and HR Manager . 
- To prepare production tasks assigned by Factory Manager, prepare production schedules, and assigning specific duties working with line supervisors, leaders and workers
Job Requirement:
- Cambodian Nation with age under 40. 
- A recognized degree of Business Administration preferred. 
- Good writing and speaking in English or Japanese. 
- Experience in manufacturing factory is preferable. 
- Experience in administration work is also desirable. 
- Good organizational and interpersonal skills. 
- Good negotiation and influencing skills. 

- Salary Range: 500$ - 600$ (Welcome for the candidate who is willing to be Production Manager).

I very much appreciate to have meeting and interview for qualified candidates who wish to work for our Newpex Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
1) Achieves sales operational objectives by developing monthly management plans that effectively market the companies services to the local market, as well as identifying, key networking events, potential promotional partners and key market trends; actively manage sales pipeline; implementing change as necessary
2) Responsible for managing the success of sales team by providing coaching and acting as an advisor to improve sales techniques. Additionally, the manager should constantly monitor the development of sales leads and analyze the performance of each team member. Provides individual feedback and determines areas for improvement to boost sales activity

4) Hardworking individual, eager to meet and exceed objectives and take on more responsibility

6) Strong sales capabilities and proven track record in successful sales activities
7) Good analytical and relationship building skills

Company Profile:
Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) is a non-profit organization, established at the end of 1995 in Cambodia, working to provide food, shelter, medical care, general education and vocational training to children needing support, e.g. underprivileged children; maltreated children; children living in poverty and children without any formal education in Phnom Penh, Sihanoukville and Siem Reap. 

Currently PSE is providing help to more than 6,500 children, supporting around 3,000 children in public schools, 1,500 in the remedial education program, and 1,500 in the vocational training program. Around 500 children benefit from specific educational programs: classes for children with disability, day-care centers, infant welfare etc.

PSE employs more than 500 dedicated staff. Due to rapid growth of existing and new programs, PSE is seeking candidates for the position of Gardener (01 post), based in Phnom Penh.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ya Sarin  023 995 660  No 402, Trea Village, Sangkat Stung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, P.O. Box 2107, Phnom Penh 3  023 995 660

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
 Overseeing the day to day operations of all outlets/restaurants to ensure the quality of service, associates ‘grooming, staffing needs, cleanliness of facilities to achieve the highest guest satisfaction.
 Closely tracks and analyzes associates performance in order to plan and implement action steps to improve efficiency.
 Maintain maximum productivity of restaurant personnel through effective scheduling.
 Remains aware of profit budget and forecast in relation to daily figures.
 Motivates associates to perform their duties to the highest possible standard.
 Communicates all particulars of training and communication meetings to the Food and Beverage office.
 Completes all requisitions for General store items and Operating equipment keeping expenses to the minimum without affecting the quality.
 Maintains highest quality possible effective control and supervision of all associates’ tasks.
 Communicates on a daily basis with the Food and Beverages office through use of the Restaurant Log Book.
 Communicates and discussed any ideas concerning the restaurant with the Manager of F&B.
 Communicates any personnel ideas and guest comments, regarding the food directly with the Outlet Chef
 Communicates with sub department heads on subject pertaining to the cleanliness and repair of the outlet, i.e. Housekeeping and Maintenance.
 Effectively follows up any points previously communicated and ensure action is taken as fast as possible.
 Plans and co-ordinates effectively for future trends of business and takes action accordingly through effective communication and scheduling of restaurant personnel.
 Attends Food and Beverage meetings and communicates meeting minutes and agendas to all F&B associates.
 Maintain amount of staff within manning guide.
 Develop employees through effective guidance, coaching and counselling.
 Maintain discipline of restaurant brigade carrying out any disciplinary action in accordance with company policies and rules and regulations.
 Evaluates all personnel at least once per year in accordance with company policy.
 Controls all operating equipment such as lines, chinaware, glassware and cutlery to maintain quality and keep losses to minimum possible.
 Remains well informed of any future promotions or events about to, or taking place in the hotel and communicates these to the restaurant brigade.
 Maintains thorough knowledge of all facilities provided for the quests in the hotel including all other outlets.
 Coordinates with other departments for a smooth preparation for any events, banquet and conference bookings.
 Trains F&B Service brigade of service quality standards, customer interactions and other position skill based trainings so as to achieved highest customer satisfaction
 Adhere to hotel’s grooming standards.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s Degree in Hotel and Restaurant Management or related field
 Minimum 3 years’ experience restaurant management
 Good command of English both spoken & written.
 Good knowledge of computer skill: word, excel, Power Point, internet & E-mail.
 Good communication skill, self-motivation.
 Knowledge in F&B franchising operation, F&B preparation
 Pleasant personality, positive attitude & service oriented

job title: Customer Relation & Credit Control Officer - CR&CC
position: Customer Relation & Credit Control Officer - CR&CC
Job Description:
•	Call to customer to ask for payment.
•	Control daily money collection report (Collection Sheet).
•	Total the incoming money per day and report to assistant of supervisor.
•	Assign salesmen and collectors to make an appointment with customers or to collect money by their schedule.
•	Request for statement issuing for collectors and salesmen to AR.
•	Request for credit memo to AR.
•	Call to customers and follow up in case there is problem and solve that problem.
•	Follow up with collector for COD invoices
•	Analyze  and control credit limit and credit term of customers
•	Reply for customer balance as requested by salesman 
•	Call to salesman to report some information and problems.
•	Run report for salesman
•	Complete bank statement (Name of customer, ID, Number of invoice, Name of salesman)
•	Follow up the remaining amount of money in bank statement to find out which customer has deposited that amount.
•	Check bank statement if it completed or not yet and keep it in the file.
•	Follow up and confirmation about installment payment for Borei Chipmong flat.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree holder in Finance/Accounting or related field
•	Financial and Accounting skill is  must
•	At least 1 year experience in related field
•	Good communication skill and problem solving
•	Proficiency in Microsoft word and Excel
•	Good communication in English both spoken and written
•	Willing to work under pressure, flexible environment 
•	Good Knowledge of Microsoft office Application



WWe offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including year-end double pay, meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with covering letter and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, send to our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia, Email : hr@chipmonggroup.com  or Tel: 017 593 222.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017 593 222 P.O Box 137, #137B, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia.  017 593 222
